db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.1.

db:listitem.db:para: SpinBox is part of Buttons and Controls

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: SpinBox allows the user to choose a value by clicking the up or down buttons, or by pressing up or down on the keyboard. The user can also type the value in manually.
By default the SpinBox provides discrete values in the range [0-99] with a stepSize of 1 and 0 decimals.
Note that if you require decimal values you will need to set the decimals to a non 0 value.

db:section.db:title: activeFocusOnPress : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the Spinbox should get active focus when pressed. The default value is true.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.5] cursorPosition : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the position of the cursor in the SpinBox.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.5.

db:section.db:title: decimals : int
db:section.db:para: This property indicates the amount of decimals. Note that if you enter more decimals than specified, they will be truncated to the specified amount of decimal places. The default value is 0.

db:section.db:title: font : font
db:section.db:para: This property indicates the current font used by the SpinBox.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.1] horizontalAlignment : enumeration
db:section.db:para: This property indicates how the content is horizontally aligned within the text field.
The supported values are:
The default value is style dependent.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.1.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] hovered : bool
db:section.db:para: This property indicates whether the control is being hovered.

db:section.db:title: [read-only, since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] inputMethodComposing : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the SpinBox has partial text input from an input method.

While it is composing an input method may rely on mouse or key events from the SpinBox to edit or commit the partial text. This property can be used to determine when to disable events handlers that may interfere with the correct operation of an input method.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: maximumValue : real
db:section.db:para: The maximum value of the SpinBox range. The value is clamped to this value. If maximumValue is smaller than minimumValue, minimumValue will be enforced.
The default value is 99.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] menu : Component
db:section.db:para: This property contains the edit Menu for working with text selection. Set it to null if no menu is wanted.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: minimumValue : real
db:section.db:para: The minimum value of the SpinBox range. The value is clamped to this value.
The default value is 0.0.

db:section.db:title: prefix : string
db:section.db:para: The prefix for the value. I.e "$"

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.3] selectByMouse : bool
db:section.db:para: This property determines if the user can select the text with the mouse.
The default value is true.
This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.3.

db:section.db:title: stepSize : real
db:section.db:para: The amount by which the value is incremented/decremented when a spin button is pressed.
The default value is 1.0.

db:section.db:title: style : Component
db:section.db:para: The style Component for this control.

db:member.db:link: Qt Quick Controls Styles QML Types

db:section.db:title: suffix : string
db:section.db:para: The suffix for the value. I.e "cm"

db:section.db:title: value : real
db:section.db:para: The value of this SpinBox, clamped to minimumValue and maximumValue.
The default value is 0.0.

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 1.1] editingFinished()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the Return or Enter key is pressed or the control loses focus.
The corresponding handler is onEditingFinished.
This signal was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 1.1.
